alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Forsyth (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Numerous showers and storms will impact portions of southwestern Forsyth and Davidson Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of a few strong storms near Lexington, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, and heavy downpours SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Thomasville, Clemmons, Bermuda Run, Linwood, Arcadia, High Rock Boat Dock Marina, Welcome, Nc Wildlife Access Boat Launch and High Rock Lake Marina & Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
